pull_request.title: RFC: Reflector to reflect on all attributes
pull_request.body:
A bare-minimum, proof-of-concept implementation for gathering all ReflectionAttributes from a given source. This PR updates the Reflector interface and DefaultReflector implementation to include a reflectAllAttributes() method that will return a list of ReflectionAttribute. Additionally, several type-hints on parameters and method returns have been updated to include Node\Attribute and ReflectionAttribute where appropriate.

This implementation is not meant to represent something fully working or ready to be merged in but to spark a conversation on the desired feature.

---

Hi! Thanks for the awesome library! I have a use case for statically analyzing Attributes in a PHP codebase. To facilitate this I added a `Reflector::reflectAllAttributes()` method that will return a list of ReflectionAttribute instances. Before I continued with this work I wanted to get the maintainers feedback to:

1. See if this feature is even desired by the team and would be open to merging in to the codebase.
2. Collaborate on possible concerns with the implementation and to solidify the changes to the Reflector API.

## Todo

1. Finish testing and implementing the `ReflectionAttribute::createFromNode` method to construct the correct reflection for the node that owns the attribute.
2. Introduce additional methods on the `Reflector` interface for narrowing the ReflectionAttributes returned.

repo.name: BetterReflection
repo.description: :crystal_ball: Better Reflection is a reflection API that aims to improve and provide more features than PHP's built-in reflection API.

commits.message:
Feature Request: Reflect All Attributes

A bare-minimum, proof-of-concept implementation for gathering all
ReflectionAttributes from a given source. This PR updates the Reflector
interface and DefaultReflector implementation to include a
reflectAllAttributes() method that will return a list of
ReflectionAttribute. Additionally, several type-hints on parameters and
method returns have been updated to include Node\Attribute and
ReflectionAttribute where appropriate.

This implementation is not meant to represent something fully working or
ready to be merged in but to spark a conversation on the desired
feature.

milestone.title: v0.3 Release
milestone.description: All of the issues and pull requests related to the v0.3 release.

commits.message:
Feature/third party code/34 (#50)

* Functions to create container definitions for third-party

* Add first third-party annotation

* Remove ServiceDefinition::getImplementedServices

* Introduce ability to add third party services during compile process

* Update the dummy apps version

* use correct version of dummy apps

* move constants to test code

* fix use of ambiguous env var
